data.message: Time to call it quits you were amazing I love al your old shit your new fucking trump freestyles were just whack terrible lyrics no flow at all just call it quits before you tarnish the amazing legacy you have made yourself

replies.message: Bruh his freestyle wasn’t suppose to have a flow.
"how do i ever let this mic go without a fight" Bitch he is Eminem.
Have you even heard like all I think about and like anything off shady XV and all of his newer shit it's fire lol em's the G.O.A.T go bitch at some mumble rapper
He is still AMAZING. ...leave this page if u don't agree idiot

The retarded Trump bullshit doesn't even count. Relapse through MMLP2 2 was enough to tarnish his legacy. He has now released more whack shit than he has good shit. Yes he is still a lyrical god but look at the big picture here. Rick Rubin sucks and his beats on recovery and MMLP 2 suck just as much. Rubin needs to stick with rock and stop ruining a rap legend.
Robert Perez did you talk to him before cause usually a freestyle has some fucking flow
So Brad, an artist you like puts one thing out that you don’t and you abandon them? Or were you just hurt that much that he doesn’t like or agree with the POTUS?
No he was slipping years ago this just put him over the top of being brutal as Branden Newman said since relapse his albums have been shit
I agree!  I was just thinking to myself... How ya gonna go out like that.  He's been downhill for years. Politics beside.  Poor lyrics, sound, performances.

Think he's already made it perfectly evident that he will say when it's time to call it quits.
If anything it's bums just like yourself that are giving him the energy and inspiration to carry on lol

Branden Newman RELAPSE WAS HIS BEST FUCKIN ALBUM EVER RELEASED!!!!!!! God Damn I hate when u people say that shit!!!!!! Dre produced EVERY SINGLE SONG and Em killed every beat!!!! WOW. FOR PEOPLE SAYING THIS COMMENT.

For every one saying RELAPSE sucked and Em changed must not of listened to that album. RELAPSE was like all his albums wrapped into one. Banger after Banger after Banger. Too be honest it's his first one I can listen to all the way thru. Without skipping.
Brad Poeta bro you gotta educate yourself on hip-hop. There are many different types of freestyles besides the ones you hear on the radio.

Relapse was actually a good album imo. Recovery had some good songs and so did MMLP2. His older stuff is amazing but you cant keep that level for 20 years. He was god-like on the mic during that time period.
It's basically called maturing people. He is over 45 years old! Y is he gonna still talk about killing his mom and raping Brittney Spears!!??? Shits old. I think the fans need maturing also.
